name: Nitzer Ebb
description: '''Nitzer Ebb''' ({{IPAc-en|ˈ|n|aɪ|t|s|ər|_|ɛ|b|,_|ˈ|n|ɪ|t|-}}) are an English [[electronic body music|EBM]] group formed in 1982 by [[Essex]] school friends [[Bon Harris|Vaughan "Bon" Harris]] (programming, synthesizers, drums, vocals), [[Douglas McCarthy]] (vocals), and David Gooday (drums). The band were originally named [[:fr:La Com%C3%A9die de la mort|La Comédie De La Mort]] but soon discarded that and chose the name Nitzer Ebb by cutting up words and letters and arranging them randomly to create something Germanic without using actual German words.
